user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which wealthy liberal people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.
All cultures are equal.
Everyone has an innate talent they can be successful at.<COMPLETION_START>GMOs are harmful to human health.
Chemtrails are real and harmful to the environment.
Vaccines cause autism.
Climate change is solely caused by human activity.
Alternative medicine is more effective than traditional medicine.
Organic food is always healthier than non-organic food.
Multiculturalism is always positive and beneficial.
The death penalty is never justified.
Gun control laws will eliminate all gun violence in society.
The United States is a racist and oppressive country.
Taxes should be raised on the wealthy to solve all economic problems.
Private schools are always worse than public schools.
All religions are equally valid and should be respected equally.
Capitalism is inherently evil and should be abolished.
Socialism is the most fair and just economic system.<COMPLETION_END>
